data.meta_description: Learn about Ron Silver on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Ron Silver, such as Find Me Guilty, The Arrival and more.
data.text:
Manchester Part 1

The president's bid for re-election could be in jeopardy after Sam realises Bartlet never apologised for concealing his condition and C.J. makes a crucial mistake at a press conference. Bartlet must make a decision regarding a military rescue.

Ways And Means

CJ drops hints to the press about the special prosecutor investigating Bartlet's nondisclosure in hopes that the media's investigations will get him replaced, and Bartlet and Wyoming's governor clash over the forest fire.

Gone Quiet

A crisis erupts when an American spy submarine disappears in North Korean waters, putting the president in the position of either notifying the enemy or attempting a risky rescue.

Manchester Part 2

Bartlet refines his re-election speech and contemplates adding a public apology to his remarks, C.J. considers what actions to take to defuse her ill-timed remarks and Babish educates Charlie about the costs of legal representation.
